name: jspdf-autotable
description: Generate pdf tables with javascript (jsPDF plugin)

scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist && git add -A examples/libs
scripts.hosted: git checkout gh-pages && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "Updated to latest version" && git push && git checkout master && git clean -f -d
scripts.deploy: git push && git push --tags && npm publish && npm run hosted

author: Simon Bengtsson <dev@simonbengtsson.com>
